faq.pageSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about booking tours, payments, and more. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.
faq.stillHaveQuestionsDesc: Our friendly support team is here to help you with any questions you may have.

questions.q: How do I make a booking?
questions.a: Making a booking is easy! Simply browse our tours, select your preferred date and number of travelers, fill in your details, and complete the payment. You'll receive a confirmation email with all the details within minutes.

questions.q: Can I modify my booking after confirmation?
questions.a: Yes, you can modify your booking up to 48 hours before the tour date. Log into your account, go to "My Bookings," and select the booking you wish to modify. Some changes may incur additional fees depending on availability.

Our standard cancellation policy offers: Full refund (minus processing fees) for cancellations 30+ days before the tour; 75% refund for 15-30 days; 50% refund for 7-14 days; No refund for cancellations less than 7 days before the tour.

questions.q: Do I need to print my booking confirmation?
questions.a: No, you don't need to print your confirmation. Simply show the confirmation email or your booking in the Voyago app on your smartphone to the tour guide.

questions.q: Can I book for someone else?
questions.a: Yes, you can book tours for friends or family. Simply enter their details as the traveler information during the booking process.

questions.q: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.a: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), debit cards, and PayPal. All transactions are processed through secure, encrypted connections.
No, we believe in transparent pricing. The price you see includes all applicable taxes and fees.
Payment is processed immediately when you confirm your booking. This secures your spot on the tour.
Yes! We offer discounts for groups of 6 or more people. Contact our team directly to get a custom quote for your group.

questions.q: What currency are prices displayed in?
questions.a: Prices are displayed in the local currency of the tour destination. During checkout, you'll see the final amount with the current exchange rate.

questions.q: What should I bring on a tour?
questions.a: We recommend bringing: comfortable walking shoes, weather-appropriate clothing, sunscreen and sunglasses, a water bottle, your camera, and any personal medications.

questions.q: Are your tours suitable for people with mobility issues?
questions.a: Many of our tours can accommodate guests with mobility issues. Look for the accessibility icon on tour listings, or contact us before booking to discuss your specific needs.

questions.q: What happens if the weather is bad?
questions.a: Most tours operate rain or shine. However, if weather conditions are dangerous, we'll reschedule or offer a full refund.

questions.q: What languages are tours available in?
questions.a: Our tours are primarily conducted in English and Italian. Some tours offer additional languages including Spanish, French, and German.
Yes, children are welcome on most tours. Children under 3 are usually free, and discounts are available for children aged 3-12.

questions.q: How do I create an account?
questions.a: Click the "Sign Up" button in the top right corner. You can register using your email address or sign up with your Google account.

questions.q: I forgot my password. How can I reset it?
questions.a: Click "Login," then select "Forgot Password." Enter your registered email address, and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

questions.q: How can I contact customer support?
questions.a: You can reach us through email at support@voyago.com, phone at +20 111 893 6100, or the contact form on our website.

questions.q: Can I leave a review for my tour?
questions.a: Absolutely! After your tour, you'll receive an email inviting you to share your experience.

privacy.pageSubtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Voyago. We are committed to protecting your personal information and being transparent about the information we collect about you.

infoCollect.title: Information We Collect
items: Personal Identification Information: Name, email address, phone number
Payment Information: Credit card details (processed securely)
Booking Information: Tour preferences, travel dates, group size
Account Information: Login credentials, profile details
Communication Data: Messages and inquiries you send us

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use your information to process bookings, communicate about your tours, improve our services, and send promotional offers (with your consent).

infoSharing.title: Information Sharing
items: Service Providers: We may share information with partners who help us operate
Tour Partners: Your details may be shared with tour operators
Legal Requirements: We may disclose information if required by law
Business Transfers: In case of merger or acquisition

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookie settings in your browser.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete your personal information, and opt out of marketing communications.
